title: looking for adc to duo with
body:
looking for someone that doesnt mind using the in game chat, doesnt have to be active (ill be fluctuating wether i can be on during weeks, one week i can, next i cant, etc) has to be ok with me buying face of the mountain, no sightstone (will still ward with basic ward tho) and me bieng sion support, prefered adc champs are draven vayne and jinx, varus and ashe are ok i guess, add me as friend in game if interested, i dont check my LOL profile that much :D
will first be on begining of next week and the on again off again will begin then, if we get out of bronze will see where things go from there, im just hoping to get out of the ditch so i cant start cimbing without wishing for good luck
I am still in promos

replies.body: Still doing my promos as well. Keen to team up. I cued for adc/support in ranked solo and seem to always get support. Keen to adc. Still learning but keen to have fun and learn at the same time.

friend me, i will probably forget to friend u XD, but with the way it works we must cover at least 3 lanes, so we cant both put in adc/support, u can adc/? and i can sup/?, if u see this i will be on for a week starting this saturday
